mutants.code:
def generate_identity_matrix(n):
    """
    Generates an nxn identity matrix.

    Args:
        n (int): The size of the matrix.

    Returns:
        list: A 2D list representing the identity matrix.
    """
    return [[-(i == j) for j in range(n)] for i in range(n)]

mutants.code:
def generate_identity_matrix(n):
    """
    Generates an nxn identity matrix.

    Args:
        n (int): The size of the matrix.

    Returns:
        list: A 2D list representing the identity matrix.
    """
    return [[+(i != j) for j in range(n)] for i in range(n)]
